ISSUE.TITLE: Last draft NaN value for a content
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Small and minor issue when you open the see more of a content you edited less than 1 second ago: `Modified NaN by.. ` ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/35d498de-0d62-4b6b-8f35-dcf4f3982625) Here's how to reproduce: https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4b8cb292-d19f-414a-b0bd-26dd56cb882a
